price: 13. Als onze verzen aan hem gereciteerd worden, zegt hij: “Legendes van de voorouders!”
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
